name: slack-lunch-club-backend
description: All lambda functions for slack-lunch-club backend logic
author: Michael Staub <mikestaub22@gmail.com> (http://michaelstaub.com)

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build:lambda && npm run build:gql
scripts.deploy:staging: export NODE_ENV=staging && serverless create_domain --stage staging && serverless deploy --stage staging && npm run publish-schema:staging
scripts.deploy:production: export NODE_ENV=production && serverless create_domain --stage production && serverless deploy --stage production && npm run publish-schema:production
scripts.publish-schema:development: export IS_INVOKE_LOCAL=true && serverless invoke local --function publish-schema --stage development
scripts.publish-schema:staging: export IS_INVOKE_LOCAL=true && serverless invoke local --function publish-schema --stage staging
scripts.publish-schema:production: export IS_INVOKE_LOCAL=true && serverless invoke local --function publish-schema --stage production
scripts.test-match-func: export IS_INVOKE_LOCAL=true && serverless invoke local --function match-mailer --stage development
scripts.test-db-backup: export IS_INVOKE_LOCAL=true && serverless invoke local --function db-backup --stage development
scripts.test-db-restore: export IS_INVOKE_LOCAL=true && serverless invoke local --function db-restore --stage development --data '{"s3Key": "S3_KEY_PLACE_HOLDER"}'
